  • 方法详细资料

    • isLegalDate

      public static boolean isLegalDate​(int length, java.lang.String sDate, java.lang.String format)
      A public static method to check if the date format is legal
      参数:
      length - Input String value(input date) length
      sDate - Input String value(input date)
      format - "yyyy-MM-dd" / "yyyy-MM" and so on
      返回:
      Boolean value - if it is valid, it will return true

    • yearRange

      public static boolean yearRange​(java.lang.String date)
      A public static method to check if the year is in the range of (START_YEAR_LIMIT,END_YEAR_LIMIT)
      参数:
      date - String type - date (with a date format - yyyy-MM-dd)
      返回:
      Boolean value - if it is valid, it will return true

    • buyerValidLength

      public static boolean buyerValidLength​(java.lang.String inputValue)
      A public static method to check if the length of buyer's name(given+family) is valid
      参数:
      inputValue - Name or any string
      返回:
      Boolean value - if it is valid, it will return true

    • vehicleValidLength

      public static boolean vehicleValidLength​(java.lang.String inputValue)
      A public static method to check if the length of vehicle's name(Sedan+Truck) is valid
      参数:
      inputValue - Any string need to check
      返回:
      Boolean value - if it is valid, it will return true
